## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Code quality improvement

## Testing
<!-- Describe how you tested your changes -->

### Manual Testing
- [ ] Built successfully (`npm run build`)
- [ ] Interactive UI works (`npm start`)
- [ ] Demo script works (`npm run demo`)
- [ ] Quickstart works (`npm run quickstart`)

### Automated Testing (if applicable)
- [ ] All tests pass (`npm test`)
- [ ] No linting errors
- [ ] No TypeScript errors

## Screenshots/Output
<!-- If applicable, add screenshots or terminal output -->

## Code Quality Checklist
- [ ] Code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] Self-review of code completed
- [ ] Code commented where necessary (particularly complex algorithms)
- [ ] Documentation updated (README, DEMO, FEATURES, etc.)
- [ ] No new warnings or errors introduced
- [ ] Changes generate no new TypeScript errors

## Dependencies
- [ ] No new dependencies added
- [ ] OR: New dependencies are necessary and have been reviewed
- [ ] OR: Dependency versions updated (security/bug fixes)
